ModMetaData.name: Early Spacer Colonists
ModMetaData.author: Bitbyte
ModMetaData.description:
After many years of playing rimworld, I felt like the start is a bit slow. So I made this mod which fixes that!
[b]v 1.1[/b]
[b]FEATURES:[/b] [list] [*]New faction and scenario! The Early Spacer Colonists [*]Start with more research, building materials, better weapons and more! [*]Compatible with ALL DLC's [*]Compatible with many mods, including: [list] [*]Dubs Bad Hygiene [*]Vanilla Expanded and all their expansions [*]Expanded Prosthetics and Organ Engineering [*]And many more... [/list] [/list]
If you encounter any bugs, please comment and tell me, and I will fix them as soon as I can. The same thing goes for mod compatability. If you have any other suggestions, please share!
Github link: https://github.com/mariusfranzen/EarlySpaceColonists
